alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 2:50PM CDT until July 23 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR FILLMORE COUNTY... At 249 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Rushford to 7 miles west of Harmony, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported 60 mph wind gusts. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Henrytown, Forestville State Park, Choice, Carimona, Old Barn Campground, Isinours and Hutton. People attending the Fillmore County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
